translations: n．典范，模范：一个被认为是某种品质、美德或技能的完美示例。

sentences.sentence: We don't expect candidates to be paragons of virtue.
sentences.translation: 我们不指望候选人都是道德完人。

sentences.sentence: Not all emerging markets, though, were such paragons.
sentences.translation: 然而，并不是所有的新兴市场都是这样的典范。

sentences.sentence: Dictionaries are supposed to be paragons of accuracy.
sentences.translation: 麦当劳的发言人沃尔特·莱克说：“词典应该是准确的典范。”
